channel.title: How do i run my server online?
channel.description: I have my server source and jdk 6_1 and jre 1.5.0.1 what eva i got the latest version but when i clcik runserver its says statr on 0.0.0.0:43594 and i cna log into my server but no noe else can. I have a router and i have portforwarded now hwat d oi need do. please help me!!!

item.title: How do i run my server online?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:10, topic:119404”]no you don’t need to port forward to play on a server all you need to do if you want to play on a server is download moparscape client and put in ip and port if you want to play a server.

Only the hoster has to port forward.[/quote]

ty.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i run my server online?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

hamachi SUCKS! DO NOT USE hamachi!!
Use no-ip.
go to www.no-ip.com sign up, download there client and run it. make a host on website and if you have already port forwarded that all you have to do is register server.

item.title: How do i run my server online?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

use www.no-ip.com better then hamachi…tooo bad mines doest work anymore…dame…

Sign Up
Sign uP A Host
Goto Download Section
Download The Client…(u gotta pick which OS u have)
Open the program
put username and password
and u gonna see your host like: examplehost.no-ip.org or info or etc…
click the little box…unclick it once it says no update needed…

if u got a router CoNFIG it
